main

Class Users

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Users
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UsersDB

    public abstract class Users
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Users class. The parent class of UsersDB. It is responsible for hashing passwords, checking if passwords are valid and creating the users sessionID. Furthermore the class is a template for the UsersDB class and defines what methods it must have.

    • Method Detail

      • hashPassword

        public java.lang.String hashPassword(java.lang.String password)
        This method employs the Bcrypt library to hash passwords. It generates salt and adds it to the hashing ensuring unique and secure password hashes.
        Parameters:
        password - - The plain text password the user entered.
        Returns:
        - Returns the now hashed password.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(User user,
                       java.lang.String password)
        This method checks whether or not a plain text password matches a hash password.
        Parameters:
        user - - The current user attempting to login.
        password - - The password entered by the user.
        Returns:
        - Returns true if the plain text password matches the hashed password when hashed, else returns false.

      • createSessionID

        public int createSessionID()
        This method creates the sessionID given to users for the duration of their log in.
        Returns:
        - Returns the sessionID that is stored in the sessions database table.
